javadoc:
Overrides the {@link DefaultEdgeLabelRenderer} so that the client can set the non-picked
 foreground color.  See {@link #setNonPickedForegroundColor(Color)}.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the foreground color for this renderer when the edge is not picked/selected
@param color the color
methods.name: setNonPickedForegroundColor
methods.comment: Sets the foreground color for this renderer when the edge is not picked/selected

name: VisualGraphEdgeLabelRenderer
comment:
Overrides the DefaultEdgeLabelRenderer so that the client can set the non-picked
 foreground color.  See #setNonPickedForegroundColor(Color).
